name: Spaceangle
description:
Hey, I know:

Its a little project I made for the MonoGameJam 4.  I tried to get used to the framework and considering the little time I had, i think can be happy ^^

In the game you play as a little triangle and shoot your enemies.

If you are interested, you can find the source code here: https://github.com/Tituspdf/MonoGameJam4
